trans-unit.source: Configures the <xref uid="langword_csharp_xhtmlConformance" name="xhtmlConformance" href=""></xref> section.
trans-unit.target: 配置<xref uid="langword_csharp_xhtmlConformance" name="xhtmlConformance" href=""></xref>部分。

trans-unit.source: The XhtmlConformanceSection class provides a way to programmatically access and modify the `xhtmlConformance` section of a configuration file.
trans-unit.target: XhtmlConformanceSection 类使您能够以编程方式访问和修改`xhtmlConformance`配置文件节。

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > ASP.NET allows you to create Web pages that are compliant with XHTML 1.1 standards.
trans-unit.target: 1> [!NOTE] 1> ASP.NET，可创建符合 XHTML 1.1 标准的网页。

trans-unit.source: For more information about the XHTML 1.1 standard, see the W3C site.
trans-unit.target: 有关 XHTML 1.1 标准的详细信息，请参阅 W3C 站点。

trans-unit.source: By default, when you are working with browsers that support HTML 4.0 or later, ASP.NET pages and controls render markup that is compatible with the XHTML 1.0 Transitional standard.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，当你使用的浏览器支持 HTML 4.0 或更高版本，ASP.NET 页面和控件呈现兼容 XHTML 1.0 Transitional 标准的标记。

trans-unit.source: However, under some circumstances, you might not want ASP.NET to render XHTML markup.
trans-unit.target: 但是，某些情况下，您可能不希望 ASP.NET XHTML 标记呈现。

trans-unit.source: This is typically true when you have existing pages that rely on tags or attributes that would ordinarily be prohibited by XHTML.
trans-unit.target: 如果您的现有依赖于标记或特性时，通常将禁止的 XHTML 的页面，也是通常如此。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.Configuration.XhtmlConformanceSection"></xref> class using default parameters.
trans-unit.target: 初始化的新实例<xref href="System.Web.Configuration.XhtmlConformanceSection"></xref>类使用默认参数。

trans-unit.source: The XhtmlConformanceSection constructor is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: XhtmlConformanceSection 构造函数不应在代码中直接使用。

trans-unit.source: It is called by the ASP.NET configuration system.
trans-unit.target: 它是由 ASP.NET 配置系统调用的。

trans-unit.source: You obtain an instance of the <xref:System.Web.Configuration.XhtmlConformanceSection> class by using the <xref:System.Configuration.Configuration.GetSection%2A> method.
Gets or sets the Mode property.
By default, when you are working with browsers that support HTML 4.0 or later, ASP.NET pages and controls render markup that is compatible with the XHTML 1.0 Transitional standard.
trans-unit.target: 默认情况下，当你使用的浏览器支持 HTML 4.0 或更高版本，ASP.NET 页面和控件呈现兼容 XHTML 1.0 Transitional 标准的标记。

trans-unit.source: However, under some circumstances, you might not want ASP.NET to render XHTML markup.
trans-unit.target: 但是，某些情况下，您可能不希望 ASP.NET XHTML 标记呈现。

trans-unit.source: This is typically true when you have existing pages that rely on tags or attributes that would ordinarily be prohibited by XHTML.
trans-unit.target: 如果您的现有依赖于标记或特性时，通常将禁止的 XHTML 的页面，也是通常如此。
